telebot.welcome_msg:
Hello! I'm your StocksBuddy \U0001F60A 

Simply send me a stock ticker in the chat to check its prices and trend \U0001F4B9 or click on the menu for other functions

To the moon~~~ \U0001F680 \U0001F315 

More features to be added soon! \U0001F609

telebot.ticker_not_found_msg:
no data found on NASDAQ?
please check if the stock ticker symbol is correct
telebot.after_sentiment_msg: You can type and send StockBuddy a stock ticker in the chat to find out more about the stock
telebot.ask_if_donate_msg:
StockBuddy is paying 5 US dollar per month to run this service in the cloud \U0001F972 

StockBuddy appreciates any form of support from you. Would you like make a donation?
telebot.no_donate_reply_msg: It's fine! StocksBuddy will still be your good buddy
